text: He imanadaragana! Tomara adhikansa anumana hate dure thaka; karana kono kono anumana papa ebam tomara eke an'yera gopaniya bisaya sandhana karo na ebam eke an'yera gibata karo na [1]. Tomadera madhye ki ke'u tara mrta bha'iyera gosata khete ca'ibe [2]? Bastuta tomara to eke ghrnya'i mane kara. Ara tomara allahara taka'oya abalambana kara; niscaya allah ta'oba grahanakari, parama dayalu
